author: giffels
body:
Hi,

could you pickup DBS release 3.1.8a for the HG1312 upgrade, please? We found that some of the old DBS 2 data can not be migrated between two DBS 3 instances, this version fixes that problem.

Thanks,
Manuel
title: comp.pre slc5_amd64_gcc461 dbs3 dbs3-client dbs3-migration dbs3-pycurl-client
